articles.title: US Carries Out Strike In Iraq Amid Escalated Tensions After Israel Airstrike In Beirut - ABP Live
articles.description: A US defense official said American forces struck 'combatants' south of Baghdad who were attempting to launch attack drones.
articles.content: US Strikes Israel: As regional tensions escalated after an Israeli airstrike in Beirut that Israel claimed killed Hezbollah's most senior commander, the United States on Tuesday conducted a strike in… [+1375 chars]

articles.title: USA Rugby Gets Huge Donation From Businesswoman Michele Kang After Bronze Medal Win - Sports Illustrated

articles.content:
On Tuesday, the United States women's rugby sevens team won twice.
